activities:
Retailers and Vendors only requires first name, last name, address,city, state, and zip code when registering. These are only used to provide the necessary information required for processing payments through the Braintree payment gateway. No personal identifiable information is kept unless the individual member elects to put their business contact information own their business profile page for other members to use for "business to business" only.  State is used in the search section to allow
members to search by state.
Referrals that result in paid membership are compensated monetarily to individuals referring Retailers and Vendors Direct LLC, HOWEVER we do not designate specific work hours, days or places.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: All the information that is saved to the www.retailersandvendors.com database is fully auditable. Retailers and Vendors Direct LLC is TRUSTe certified.
